text: Novonikolayevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Konstantinogradovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 6 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Sterlitamak, 10 km from Konstantinogradovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Novonikolayevka, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
